name: openslide

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: OpenSlide reads whole slide image files.

dependencies.name: cairo
dependencies.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

dependencies.name: gdk-pixbuf
dependencies.description:
The Gdk Pixbuf is a toolkit for image loading and pixel buffer
manipulation. It is used by GTK+ 2 and GTK+ 3 to load and manipulate
images. In the past it was distributed as part of GTK+ 2 but it was
split off into a separate package in preparation for the change to GTK+
3.

dependencies.name: glib
dependencies.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
libjpeg is a widely used free library with functions for handling the
JPEG image data format. It implements a JPEG codec (encoding and
decoding) alongside various utilities for handling JPEG data.

dependencies.name: libtiff
dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: openjpeg
dependencies.description:
OpenJPEG is an open-source JPEG 2000 codec written in C language. It has
been developed in order to promote the use of JPEG 2000, a still-image
compression standard from the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG).
Since April 2015, it is officially recognized by ISO/IEC and ITU-T as a
JPEG 2000 Reference Software.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: sqlite
dependencies.description:
SQLite is a C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-
contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine.

dependent_to.name: py-openslide-python
dependent_to.description: OpenSlide Python is a Python interface to the OpenSlide library.
